required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Autoimmune Cell Therapy for Patients With Hepatocellular Carcinoma
clinical_study.official_title: An Exploratory Study on the Safety and Effectiveness of Autoimmune Cell Therapy Sensitized With Liver Cancer Neoantigen in Patients With High Risk of Recurrence After Surgical Resection of Primary Hepatocellular Carcinoma

brief_summary.textblock: In this study, safety and effects of IPM001 vaccine on human hepatocellular carcinoma are going to be investigated, IPM001 is a neoantigen/tumor-specific antigen sensitized autoimmune cell injection

primary_outcome.description: The time between the NeoAg/aeTSA CTL initiation and the onset of tumor recurrence or death from any cause

secondary_outcome.description: From the beginning of NeoAg/aeTSA CTL initiation to the time of death from any cause

arm_group.description: A neoantigen/tumor-specific antigen sensitized autoimmune cell injection

intervention.description: IPM001 will be used against tumor cells
